thread.title: How Michael Dell Kept a Big Deal Under Wraps

author: Katherine Clarke
title: How Michael Dell Kept a Big Deal Under Wraps
text:
Michael Dell managed to keep the $100.47 million purchase of a Manhattan penthouse—a record price in New York City—secret for more than five years, thanks to a tight network of real-estate agents, architects and professionals who signed nondisclosure agreements, according to sources familiar with the deal.

Real-estate experts say the Dell sale is symptomatic of a push among ultra high-net-worth individuals to keep purchases under wraps for privacy, security and tax purposes. That includes silencing professionals who work... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
